nodes.text: Scrapper's Run was a podracing course on Ord Ibanna and the fourth race of the Semipro Podracing Circuit. The course was a floating heap of fragmented roadways, forcing racers to negotiate narrow catwalks and highways thousands of miles from the planet's core.

The race begins with a quick start from the main "arena platform." The track becomes confined to a pipeline, which curves around past a drop-off point. A second drop-off marks the end of the pipeline and immediately turns right, causing damage to most uncanny racers.

After some turns, the course straightens out on some suspension bridges which lead into a tunnel. At the end of the course, the bridges end and the racers are forced to fly through an arch; any stray movement to the left or right would cause the pilot to plummet down forever with a single engine.
A podracer was bound to take damage. Racers with high repair and top-speed ratings held an advantage in this course.
This course was the fourth race in the Semipro Podracing Circuit tournament.
